definition: weaponry/to hold (a weapon)/to wield/to rely on/to depend on/war/battle
honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession

sentences.english: The guard of honour are gathering.
Guards of honor convoy the national flag enter the site of the raising ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 儀仗兵護衛國旗進入升旗儀式現場。

sentences.english: After their addresses, the two leaders inspected the Guard of Honor.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，兩國領導人檢閱了儀仗隊。

sentences.english: The guard of honor of Qin Shihuang.
After the inspection, the two leaders made some remarks respectively.
sentences.chinese: 在檢閱了儀仗隊後，兩國領導人先後致詞。

sentences.english: An honor guard presented a flag that had flown over ground zero after the attacks.
sentences.chinese: 儀仗隊手持恐怖襲擊後飄揚于歸零地上空的國旗。

sentences.english: An honor guard of five former South Vietnamese servicemen marched smartly to the front of the room.
sentences.chinese: 五名前南越軍人組成的儀仗隊瀟灑地走到大廳前面。

sentences.english: Accompanied by Balkenende, Wen inspected the honor guards of the Dutch military.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶在巴爾克嫩德陪同下檢閱了荷蘭軍隊儀仗隊。

sentences.english: He was feted by the Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, and given an honour guard of welcome on Horseguards Parade.
sentences.chinese: 他得到首相的宴請，並享受了皇家儀仗隊的歡迎。

sentences.english: It is the first time female guards of honor will join a parade.
sentences.chinese: 本次閱兵，儀仗隊中將首次出現女性面孔。

sentences.english: To welcome the steamer, a long line of honor guards marched all in step.
sentences.chinese: 爲了歡迎輪船的到來，一支儀仗隊步調合拍的行進着。

sentences.english: After Bush deplaned, he was greeted by an honor guard on the tarmac.
sentences.chinese: 布什下飛機後，在停機坪受到儀仗隊的歡迎。

sentences.english: Many a procession passes by with noise and shouts and glamour of glory.
sentences.chinese: 許多儀仗隊伍都在光彩暄鬧中走過了。

sentences.english: Accompanied by Arroyo, Hu Jintao paraded the honor guard of the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤在阿羅約陪同下檢閱了菲律賓儀仗隊。

sentences.english: The royal procession will be televised.
sentences.chinese: 國王的儀仗行列將由電視播送。

sentences.english: Hu, accompanied by Carlos, inspected the honor guard of the three services of Spain.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤在卡洛斯陪同下檢閱了西班牙三軍儀仗隊。

definition: to go on a hunting expedition
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
General Yuchi Gong (585-658), famous military man instrumental in founding the Tang dynasty
nickname of Han dynasty general Li Guang 李廣|李广[Li3 Guang3]
